string-array.item: Let\’s introduce you the key elements of a guitar. The Metal be with you!
It\’s curvacious. It screams sexy. It\'s… a guitar.
The neck basically is the section of the guitar that holds your fretboard, strings, and headstock.
The guitar head is like a real head. Without it, your guitar is basically useless and unplayable.
